description.value: This rune prevents enemies from escaping your grasp by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fleeing] to other planes. If you critically hit a target with an anchoring weapon, the weapon casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Planar Tether] on the target (@Check[type:will|dc:27|name:Dimensional Anchor]{DC 27 Will}, counteract modifier [[/r 1d20+17 #counteract]]{+17}).
